message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 50/50. Your turn!
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but still a fair deal!
Not bad, but I'd like a slightly bigger share. How about 45/55?
As I said, 45/55 seems fair to me. Your turn to decide!
I'll take a bigger share, but still leaving you with a decent amount!
Not bad, but I'd like to keep a bigger share. How about 35/65?
Still going for 35/65. It's getting harder to negotiate, but I'm willing to compromise!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a small share. Don't expect more!
I'm not giving up that much. How about 25/75?
I'm still holding out for a decent share. 25/75 is my last reasonable offer. Don't make me go lower!
I'm running out of patience, but I'll give you a tiny share. Don't expect any more!
You're really pushing your luck, Bob. I'll give you one last chance. How about 15/85?
This is my final offer. 15/85 is all I'm willing to give. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in now. You're going to get a tiny share, but that's it!
You're really rubbing it in, Bob. I'll make one last attempt. How about 7.5/92.5?
This is my final, final offer. 7.5/92.5 is all I'm willing to give. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in. You're getting a tiny share, and that's it!
